name: Match Monster
description:
“Match Monster" is an attractive interactive matching game. It helps you to train your memory and improve your time management skills. The game is full with cool animated monsters that challenge you to beat them with your amazing memory.We have some surprises for you after your victories against these creepy monsters.As a reward for your successfully completed level, you win a part of the Monsters' puzzle.After your pass each difficulty you got the chance to download for free the puzzle as a wallpaper. We have developed an unique scoreboard for all gameplayers. Catch the first place if you can ...Be the Best.

Game features :

- 48 levels in epic adventure !

- 3 difficulties - easy to learn, medium to exercise and hard for masters !

- unique three point system !

- bonus card !

- 20 crazy monsters !

- Limited Time !

- 3 different puzzles as a reward for your efforts !

Enjoy it…
